itunes:title: Doctrine & Covenants 88 Part 1 : Dr. Anthony Sweat
title: Doctrine & Covenants 88 Part 1 : Dr. Anthony Sweat
description:
How do we prepare for heaven on earth and what is the other Comforter? Dr. Anthony Sweat returns to discuss Section 88 and how we can become a celestial people. Learning from "The Olive Leaf," the Saints learn how to prepare the world, and themselves, for the return of the Savior.

Shownotes: https://followhim.co/ 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/followhimpodcast
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/followhimpodcast
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/FollowHimOfficialChannel

"Let Zion in Her Beauty Rise" by Marshall McDonald
https://www.marshallmcdonaldmusic.com/products/let-zion-in-her-beauty-rise-piano

Please rate and review the podcast.
